title: Right in the Marbles (feat. Justin Silver)
description:
The guys are remote as Dan is stuck in Canada after testing positive for Covid at the airport coming home. Justin Silver joins the show and Jay tells the gang about his encounter with a woman of the night in Los Angeles.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
